Package org.javautil.sql

Provides classes for working with SQL statements, binds, result sets, and meta data.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
QueryResource  
QueryResourceRenderer  
SqlParser  
SqlStatementBindMeta  
 

Class Summary
AbstractQueryAndPropertiesResource  
BaseQueryResourceImpl  
DisassociatedResultSetDatasetQueryResource  
ListOfMapsQueryResource QueryResource that returns as a List of Maps.
QueryHelper A helper for executing and binding jdbc statements.
QueryResourceXmlRenderer  
ResultSetDatasetResourceImpl Basic implementation of QueryResource that uses a java.sql.Connection to return a ResultSetDataSet.
SQLBindInfo Contains information about a sql statement as text.
SqlBindParameter  
SQLBindsProcessor Provides query bind validation and prepared statement binding.
SQLBindUtils Utility methods useful for operating on SQL text and jdbc statements.
SQLBindValues Stores information about the bind variable state of a query.
SQLBlobInputStream  
SqlStatementHelper Contains information about a sql statement as text.
 

Exception Summary
SQLBindException Thrown prior to a SQL statement bind when it would would fail.
 

Package org.javautil.sql Description

Provides classes for working with SQL statements, binds, result sets, and meta data.
